trans-unit.source: This rule enforces consistent spacing before and after commas in variable declarations, array literals, object literals, function parameters, and sequences.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则强制要求变量声明、数组文字、对象文字、函数参数和序列中逗号前后的间距一致。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces consistent spacing between keys and values in object literal properties. In the case of long lines, it is acceptable to add a new line wherever whitespace is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则规定了对象文字属性中键和值之间的间距一致。在长行的情况下,只要允许有空白,就可以添加新行。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces consistent spacing inside an open block token and the next token on the same line. This rule also enforces consistent spacing inside a close block token and previous token on the same line.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则要求打开的区块标记和同一行的下一个标记之间的间距一致。这条规则还规定了近似块标记和同一行上一个标记的间距一致。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces consistent spacing inside array brackets.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则强制要求数组括号内的间距一致。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces consistent spacing inside braces of object literals, destructuring assignments, and import/export specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则强制执行对象字元、拆解赋值和导入/导出指定符的括号内的一致间距。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces consistent spacing inside computed property brackets.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则强制要求计算出的属性括号内的间距一致。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces consistent use of semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则规定了分号的一致使用。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces consistent use of trailing commas in object and array literals.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则强制要求在对象和数组字面中一致使用尾部的逗号。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces default parameters to be the last of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 该规则强制将默认参数作为参数的最后一个。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces line breaks after opening and before closing array brackets.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则在打开和关闭数组括号之后和之前强制执行换行。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces line breaks between arguments of a function call.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则强制执行函数调用的参数之间的换行。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces line breaks between array elements.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则强制执行数组元素之间的换行。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces or disallows newlines between operands of a ternary expression. Note: The location of the operators is not enforced by this rule. Please see the operator-linebreak rule if you are interested in enforcing the location of the operators themselves.
trans-unit.target: 该规则强制或禁止三元表达式的操作数之间的换行符。注意：操作员的位置不受此规则约束。如果您对加强操作员本身的位置感兴趣，请参阅操作员换行规则。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces parentheses around arrow function parameters regardless of arity. For example:
trans-unit.target: 这条规则在箭头函数参数周围执行括号,而不考虑arity。例如:

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces spacing around the * in yield* expressions.
trans-unit.target: 此规则在 yield* 表达式中的 * 周围强制使用空格。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces spacing around the colon in object literal properties. It can verify each property individually, or it can ensure horizontal alignment of adjacent properties in an object literal.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则强制执行对象文字属性中的冒号周围的间距,它可以单独验证每个属性,也可以确保对象文字属性中相邻属性的水平对齐。它可以单独验证每个属性,也可以确保对象文字中相邻属性的水平对齐。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces that a return statement is present in property getters.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则强制要求在属性获取者中出现返回语句。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces that each file may contain only a particular number of classes and no more.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则规定,每个文件只能包含特定数量的类,不能再多。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces that the * is either placed next to the function keyword or the name of the function. The single option for this rule is a string specifying the placement of the asterisk. For this option you may pass "start", "middle" or "end". The default is "end".
trans-unit.target: 此规则强制将 * 放在 function 关键字旁边或函数名称旁边。此规则的单个选项是一个字符串，指定星号的位置。对于此选项，您可以传递 "start" ， "middle" 或 "end" 。默认值为 "end" 。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces the consistent use of either backticks, double, or single quotes.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则强制要求一致使用反引号、双引号或单引号。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces the consistent use of either double or single quotes in JSX attributes.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则强制要求在JSX属性中一致使用双引号或单引号。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces the use of the shorthand syntax. This applies to all methods (including generators) defined in object literals and any properties defined where the key name matches name of the assigned variable.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则强制使用速记语法。这适用于所有在对象字面定义的方法(包括生成器),以及键名与分配的变量名相匹配的任何属性。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces two things about variables with the designated alias names for this:
trans-unit.target: 此规则强制执行关于与指定的别名变量两件事情 this ：

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces usage of return statement in callbacks of array's methods.
trans-unit.target: 该规则在数组方法的回调中强制使用 return 语句。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces valid and consistent JSDoc comments. It reports any of the following problems:
trans-unit.target: 该规则强制执行有效和一致的JSDoc注释。它报告以下任何问题。

trans-unit.source: This rule enforces variables to be declared either together or separately per function ( for var) or block (for let and const) scope.
trans-unit.target: 此规则强制将变量声明为每个函数（对于 var ）或块（对于 let 和 const ）范围一起声明或单独声明。

trans-unit.source: This rule expects that when you're using the callback pattern in Node.js you'll handle the error.
trans-unit.target: 这个规则期望当你在Node.js中使用回调模式时,你会处理错误。

trans-unit.source: This rule finds callback functions of the following methods, then checks usage of return statement.
trans-unit.target: 该规则查找以下方法的回调函数，然后检查 return 语句的用法。

trans-unit.source: This rule finds references which are inside of loop conditions, then checks the variables of those references are modified in the loop.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则可以找到在循环条件中的引用,然后检查这些引用的变量在循环中被修改。

trans-unit.source: This rule flags class constructors that can be safely removed without changing how the class works.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则标志着可以在不改变类的工作方式的情况下安全地删除类构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This rule flags escapes that can be safely removed without changing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则标志着可以在不改变行为的情况下安全删除的逃逸。

trans-unit.source: This rule forbids the use of the comma operator, with the following exceptions:
trans-unit.target: 这条规则禁止使用逗号运算符,但下列情况除外:

trans-unit.source: This rule generates warnings for generator functions that do not have the yield keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此规则为不具有 yield 关键字的生成器函数生成警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule has an option to allow indirect calls to eval. Indirect calls to eval are less dangerous than direct calls to eval because they cannot dynamically change the scope. Because of this, they also will not negatively impact performance to the degree of direct eval.
trans-unit.target: 该规则具有允许间接调用 eval 的选项。间接调用 eval 比直接调用 eval 危险性小，因为它们不能动态更改范围。因此，它们也不会在直接 eval 的程度上对性能产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: This rule has an option to allow specific kinds of functions to be empty.
trans-unit.target: 该规则有一个选项,允许特定种类的函数为空。

trans-unit.target: 这个规则有一个选项。

trans-unit.source: This rule has an optional object option { allowAtRootLevel: <boolean> }, which determines whether synchronous methods should be allowed at the top level of a file, outside of any functions. This option defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 该规则具有一个可选的对象选项 { allowAtRootLevel: <boolean> } ，该选项确定是否应在文件的顶层（任何函数之外）允许同步方法。此选项默认为 false 。

trans-unit.target: 这个规则也有检查属性的选项。

trans-unit.source: This rule has three main options and one override option to allow some coercions as required.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则有三个主要选项和一个覆盖选项,允许根据需要进行一些强制。

trans-unit.target: 这条规则有三个选项。

trans-unit.target: 这个规则有两个选项,一个是字符串选项,一个是对象选项。

trans-unit.source: This rule has two options, the first one can be a string option or an object option. The second one is an object option, it can allow exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 这个规则有两个选项,第一个可以是字符串选项,也可以是对象选项。第二个是对象选项,它可以允许异常。

trans-unit.source: This rule has two options: a string value "always" or "never" which determines whether capitalization of the first word of a comment should be required or forbidden, and optionally an object containing more configuration parameters for the rule.
trans-unit.target: 该规则有两个选项：一个字符串值 "always" 或 "never" ，用于确定是否需要注释的第一个单词的大小写，以及一个可选对象，该对象包含该规则的更多配置参数。

trans-unit.source: This rule ignores spacing which is between => and a block. The spacing is handled by the arrow-spacing rule.
trans-unit.target: 该规则忽略 => 和一个块之间的间距。间距由 arrow-spacing 规则处理。

trans-unit.source: This rule ignores spacing which is between a keyword and a block. The spacing is handled by the keyword-spacing rule.
trans-unit.target: 该规则忽略关键字和块之间的间距。间距由 keyword-spacing 规则处理。

trans-unit.source: This rule improves readability by enforcing lines between class members. It will not check empty lines before the first member and after the last member, since that is already taken care of by padded-blocks.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则通过强制执行类成员之间的行数来提高可读性,它不会检查第一个成员之前和最后一个成员之后的空行,因为这一点已经由padded-blocks处理了。它不会检查第一个成员之前和最后一个成员之后的空行,因为padded-blocks已经考虑到了这一点。

trans-unit.source: This rule is a formatting preference and not following it won't negatively affect the quality of your code. If alphabetizing imports isn't a part of your coding standards, then you can leave this rule disabled.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则是一种格式偏好,不遵守它不会对你的代码质量产生负面影响。如果导入的字母化不是你的编码标准的一部分,那么你可以不使用这个规则。

trans-unit.source: This rule is a formatting preference and not following it won't negatively affect the quality of your code. If you alphabetizing variables isn't a part of your coding standards, then you can leave this rule off.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则是一种格式上的偏好,不遵守它不会对你的代码质量产生负面影响。如果你把变量字母化不是你编码标准的一部分,那么你可以不遵守这条规则。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at avoiding the unnecessary use of bind() and as such will warn whenever an immediately-invoked function expression (IIFE) is using bind() and doesn't have an appropriate this value. This rule won't flag usage of bind() that includes function argument binding.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在避免不必要地使用 bind() ，因此，当立即调用的函数表达式（IIFE）使用 bind() 并且没有适当的 this 值时，它将发出警告。此规则不会标记包括函数参数绑定的 bind() 的用法。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at catching debugging code that should be removed and popup UI elements that should be replaced with less obtrusive, custom UIs. As such, it will warn when it encounters alert, prompt, and confirm function calls which are not shadowed.
trans-unit.target: 此规则旨在捕获应删除的调试代码以及​​应使用不太引人注目的自定义UI替换的弹出UI元素。因此，当它遇到它将警告 alert ， prompt 和 confirm 未阴影函数调用。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at catching invalid whitespace that is not a normal tab and space. Some of these characters may cause issues in modern browsers and others will be a debugging issue to spot.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在捕捉无效的空白字符,这些字符不是正常的制表符和空格。其中一些字符可能会在现代浏览器中造成问题,而其他字符则是调试时需要发现的问题。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at detecting trailing commas in object literals. As such, it will warn whenever it encounters a trailing comma in an object literal.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在检测对象文字中的尾部逗号。因此,每当遇到对象文字中的尾部逗号时,它就会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at discouraging the use of var and encouraging the use of const or let instead.
trans-unit.target: 此规则旨在阻止使用 var 并鼓励使用 const 或 let 代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at discouraging the use of deprecated and sub-optimal code by disallowing the use of arguments.caller and arguments.callee. As such, it will warn when arguments.caller and arguments.callee are used.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在通过禁止使用 arguments.caller 和 arguments.callee 来阻止使用不建议使用的代码和次优代码。这样，它将在使用 arguments.caller 和 arguments.callee 时发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at discouraging use of process.env to avoid global dependencies. As such, it will warn whenever process.env is used.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在防止使用 process.env 以避免全局依赖性。因此，每当使用 process.env 时，它将发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at eliminating empty functions. A function will not be considered a problem if it contains a comment.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在消除空函数。如果一个函数包含注释,则不会被认为是一个问题。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at eliminating floating decimal points and will warn whenever a numeric value has a decimal point but is missing a number either before or after it.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在消除浮动小数点,每当一个数值有小数点,但在小数点之前或之后缺少一个数字时,它就会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at eliminating self assignments.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在消除自我分配。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at eliminating the type-unsafe equality operators.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在消除类型不安全的平等运算符。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at eliminating the use of ECMAScript 3 keywords and reserved words as object literal keys. As such, it warns whenever an object key would throw an error in an ECMAScript 3 environment.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在消除使用ECMAScript 3关键字和保留字作为对象文字键。因此,每当对象键在ECMAScript 3环境中出现错误时,它就会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at eliminating unintentional fallthrough of one case to the other. As such, it flags any fallthrough scenarios that are not marked by a comment.
trans-unit.target: 这项规则旨在消除一种情况无意中转入另一种情况。因此,它标示出任何未加注释的穿插情况。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at eliminating unnecessary labels.
trans-unit.target: 这一规则旨在消除不必要的标签。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at eliminating unused labels.
trans-unit.target: 这一规则旨在消除未使用的标签。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at eliminating unused variables, functions, and function parameters.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在消除未使用的变量、函数和函数参数。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at eliminating variables that have multiple declarations in the same scope.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在消除在同一范围内有多个声明的变量。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at enforcing or eliminating variable initializations during declaration. For example, in the following code, foo is initialized during declaration, while bar is not.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在在声明期间强制或消除变量初始化。例如，在以下代码中，在声明期间初始化 foo ，而没有初始化 bar 。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at ensuring that callbacks used outside of the main function block are always part-of or immediately preceding a return statement. This rule decides what is a callback based on the name of the function being called.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在确保在主功能块外部使用的回调始终是 return 语句的一部分或在return语句之前。该规则根据被调用函数的名称决定什么是回调。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at ensuring there are spaces around infix operators.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在确保infix操作符周围有空格。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at flagging variables that are declared using let keyword, but never reassigned after the initial assignment.
trans-unit.target: 此规则旨在标记使用 let 关键字声明的变量，但在初始赋值后永远不要重新赋值。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at highlighting an unnecessary block of code following an if containing a return statement. As such, it will warn when it encounters an else following a chain of ifs, all of them containing a return statement.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在突出显示 if 包含return语句后的不必要的代码块。因此，当它遇到它将警告 else 的连锁以下 if S，个个包含 return 语句。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at highlighting possible typos and unexpected behavior in regular expressions which may arise from the use of empty character classes.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在强调正则表达式中可能出现的排版错误和意外行为,这些错误和行为可能来自于空字符类的使用。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at maintaining code consistency and improving code readability by encouraging use of the dot notation style whenever possible. As such, it will warn when it encounters an unnecessary use of square-bracket notation.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在保持代码的一致性,并通过鼓励尽可能地使用点符号风格来提高代码的可读性。因此,当遇到不必要地使用方括号符号时,它将发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at maintaining consistency and convention by disallowing constructor calls using the new keyword that do not assign the resulting object to a variable.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在通过禁止使用不会将结果对象分配给变量的 new 关键字进行构造函数调用来保持一致性和约定。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at maintaining consistency when throwing exception by disallowing to throw literals and other expressions which cannot possibly be an Error object.
trans-unit.target: 此规则旨在通过禁止抛出可能不是 Error 对象的文字和其他表达式来保持抛出异常时的一致性。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at preventing bugs and increasing code clarity by ensuring that block statements are wrapped in curly braces. It will warn when it encounters blocks that omit curly braces.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在通过确保块语句用大括号包装来防止错误和提高代码的清晰度。当遇到省略大括号的块时,它将发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at preventing errors that may arise from using the __iterator__ property, which is not implemented in several browsers. As such, it will warn whenever it encounters the __iterator__ property.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在防止由于使用 __iterator__ 属性而引起的错误，该属性未在多个浏览器中实现。这样，它会在遇到 __iterator__ 属性时发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at preventing potentially dangerous, unnecessary, and slow code by disallowing the use of the eval() function. As such, it will warn whenever the eval() function is used.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在通过禁止使用 eval() 函数来防止潜在的危险，不必要和缓慢的代码。这样，无论何时使用 eval() 函数，它都会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at preventing synchronous methods from being called in Node.js. It looks specifically for the method suffix "Sync" (as is the convention with Node.js operations).
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在防止在Node.js中调用同步方法。它专门查找方法后缀“ Sync ”（与Node.js操作的约定相同）。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at preventing the accidental calling of Symbol with the new operator.
trans-unit.target: 此规则旨在防止意外调用 Symbol 与 new 运营商。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at preventing the unintended conversion of a string to a number of a different base than intended or at preventing the redundant 10 radix if targeting modern environments only.
trans-unit.target: 该规则的目的是防止将字符串意外地转换为与预期不同的其他基数，或者如果仅针对现代环境，则防止冗余的 10 基数。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at preventing the use of multiline strings.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在防止使用多行字符串。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at preventing unexpected behavior in your program that may arise from a bug in IE 8 and earlier, in which the catch clause parameter can leak into outer scopes. This rule will warn whenever it encounters a catch clause parameter that has the same name as a variable in an outer scope.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则的目的是为了防止在你的程序中出现意外的行为,这可能是由于IE 8和更早的版本中的一个bug,其中catch子句参数可能会泄漏到外部作用域中。每当遇到与外部作用域中的变量同名的捕捉子句参数时,这条规则就会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at preventing unexpected behavior that could arise from using a for in loop without filtering the results in the loop. As such, it will warn when for in loops do not filter their results with an if statement.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在防止 for in 不过滤循环结果的情况下使用for in循环而引起的意外行为。这样，它将在 for in 循环中不使用 if 语句过滤其结果时发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at preventing unnecessary "use strict"; directives. As such, it will warn when it encounters a "use strict"; directive when already in strict mode.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在防止不必要的 "use strict"; 指令。因此，当遇到 "use strict"; 时，它将发出警告；在严格模式下的指令。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at reducing code complexity by capping the amount of cyclomatic complexity allowed in a program. As such, it will warn when the cyclomatic complexity crosses the configured threshold (default is 20).
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在通过限制程序中允许的循环复杂度来降低代码复杂度。这样，它将在圈复杂度超过配置的阈值（默认值为 20 ）时发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed at using named capture groups instead of numbered capture groups in regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则的目的是在正则表达式中使用命名的捕获组而不是编号的捕获组。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed to flag this/super keywords before super() callings.
trans-unit.target: 此规则旨在在 super() 调用之前标记 this / super 关键字。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed to flag class methods that do not use this.
trans-unit.target: 此规则旨在标记不使用 this 方法的类方法。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed to flag invalid/missing super() calls.
trans-unit.target: 此规则旨在标记无效/丢失的 super() 调用。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed to flag modifying variables of class declarations.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在标记修改类声明的变量。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed to flag modifying variables that are declared using const keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此规则旨在标记使用 const 关键字声明的修改变量。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed to flag shorter notations for the type conversion, then suggest a more self-explanatory notation.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则的目的是为类型转换标记更短的符号,然后建议一个更自明的符号。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed to flag the use of duplicate names in class members.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则旨在标记类成员中使用重复的名称。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed to flag usage of + operators with strings.
trans-unit.target: 此规则旨在标记字符串使用 + 运算符。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed to flag usage of Function.prototype.apply() in situations where spread syntax could be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 该规则旨在在可以代替使用扩展语法的情况下标记 Function.prototype.apply() 的用法。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed to flag usage of Function.prototype.call() and Function.prototype.apply() that can be replaced with the normal function invocation.
trans-unit.target: 此规则旨在标记 Function.prototype.call() 和 Function.prototype.apply() 的用法，这些用法可以用普通的函数调用来替换。

trans-unit.source: This rule is aimed to flag usage of arguments variables.
trans-unit.target: 此规则旨在标记 arguments 变量的使用。

trans-unit.source: This rule is mostly useful for browser scripts. Top-level declarations in ES modules and CommonJS modules create module-scoped variables. ES modules also have implicit strict mode, which prevents global variable leaks.
trans-unit.target: 此规则对浏览器脚本最有用。ES模块和CommonJS模块中的顶级声明创建模块范围的变量。ES模块还具有隐式 strict 模式，可以防止全局变量泄漏。

trans-unit.source: This rule is warning every eval() even if the eval is not global's. This behavior is in order to detect calls of direct eval. Such as:
trans-unit.target: 该规则警告每个 eval() ,即使 eval 不是全局的。此行为是为了检测直接 eval 的调用。如：

trans-unit.source: This rule judges from following conditions whether or not the function is a constructor:
trans-unit.target: 本规则根据以下条件判断函数是否为构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This rule judges from following conditions whether or not the function is a method:
trans-unit.target: 该规则根据以下条件判断函数是否为方法。

trans-unit.source: This rule locates function expressions used as callbacks or function arguments. An error will be produced for any that could be replaced by an arrow function without changing the result.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则定位作为回调或函数参数的函数表达式。对于任何可以被箭头函数替换而不改变结果的函数,都会产生错误。

trans-unit.source: This rule looks for accessing a given property key on a given object name, either when reading the property's value or invoking it as a function. You may specify an optional message to indicate an alternative API or a reason for the restriction.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则在读取属性值或作为函数调用属性时,查找对给定对象名的属性键的访问。你可以指定一个可选的消息来指示一个替代的API或限制的原因。

trans-unit.source: This rule looks for any underscores (_) located within the source code. It ignores leading and trailing underscores and only checks those in the middle of a variable name. If ESLint decides that the variable is a constant (all uppercase), then no warning will be thrown. Otherwise, a warning will be thrown. This rule only flags definitions and assignments but not function calls. In case of ES6 import statements, this rule only targets the name of the variable that will be imported into the local module scope.
trans-unit.target: 该规则查找源代码中是否存在任何下划线（ _ ）。它忽略前导和尾随下划线，仅检查变量名中间的下划线。如果ESLint确定该变量是一个常量（全部大写），则不会引发警告。否则，将引发警告。该规则仅标记定义和分配，而不标记函数调用。对于ES6 import 语句，此规则仅针对将要导入本地模块范围的变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: This rule looks for tabs anywhere inside a file: code, comments or anything else.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则可以查找文件中任何地方的标签:代码、注释或其他任何东西。

trans-unit.source: This rule makes it possible to ensure, as some style guides require, that property specifications appear on separate lines for better readability. For example, you can prohibit all of these:
trans-unit.target: 这条规则可以像某些样式指南所要求的那样,确保属性规范出现在单独的行中,以提高可读性。例如,你可以禁止所有这些。

trans-unit.source: This rule may conflict with no-extra-parens rule. If you use both this and no-extra-parens rule together, you need to use the nestedBinaryExpressions option of no-extra-parens rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则可能与没有额外批准的规则冲突。如果同时使用此规则和无额外规则，则需要使用无额外规则的 nestedBinaryExpressions 选项。

trans-unit.source: This rule normalize style of spacing before/after an arrow function's arrow(=>).
trans-unit.target: 此规则规范了箭头函数的arrow（ => ）之前/之后的间距样式。

trans-unit.source: This rule optionally takes a second argument, which should be an object with the following supported properties:
trans-unit.target: 这个规则可以选择接受第二个参数,这个参数应该是一个具有以下支持属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: This rule permits you to restrict the locations of property specifications in object literals. You may prohibit any part of any property specification from appearing on the same line as any part of any other property specification. You may make this prohibition absolute, or, by invoking an object option, you may allow an exception, permitting an object literal to have all parts of all of its property specifications on a single line.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则允许您限制对象字面中属性规范的位置。您可以禁止任何属性规范的任何部分与任何其他属性规范的任何部分出现在同一行。您可以将这一禁止规定为绝对的,或者,通过调用对象选项,您可以允许一个例外,允许一个对象文字的所有属性规格的所有部分出现在同一行上。

trans-unit.source: This rule prevents the use of spaces before a semicolon in expressions.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则防止在表达式中分号前使用空格。

trans-unit.source: This rule provides compatibility with treatment of global variables in JSHint and JSLint.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则提供了处理全局变量的兼容性JSHint和JSLint的。

trans-unit.source: This rule reports catch clauses that only throw the caught error.
trans-unit.target: 此规则报告仅会 throw 捕获的错误的 catch 子句。

trans-unit.source: This rule reports comments that include any of the predefined terms specified in its configuration.
trans-unit.target: 该规则报告包含其配置中指定的任何预定义术语的注释。

trans-unit.source: This rule reports line terminators around semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 该规则报告分号周围的行结束符。

trans-unit.source: This rule reports the regular expressions which include multiple code point characters in character class syntax.
trans-unit.target: 该规则报告了字符类语法中包含多个码点字符的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: This rule reports the regular expressions which include multiple code point characters in character class syntax. This rule considers the following characters as multiple code point characters.
trans-unit.target: 本规则报告在字符类语法中包含多个码点字符的正则表达式。本规则认为下列字符为多码点字符。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires return statements to either always or never specify values. This rule ignores function definitions where the name begins with an uppercase letter, because constructors (when invoked with the new operator) return the instantiated object implicitly if they do not return another object explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 该规则要求 return 语句始终或永远不指定值。该规则将忽略名称以大写字母开头的函数定义，因为构造函数（当使用 new 运算符调用时）如果未显式返回另一个对象，则隐式返回实例化的对象。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires JSDoc comments for specified nodes. Supported nodes:
trans-unit.target: 本规则要求指定节点的JSDoc注释。支持的节点。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires a newline after each call in a method chain or deep member access. Computed property accesses such as instance[something] are excluded.
trans-unit.target: 在方法链或深层成员访问中的每次调用之后，此规则都需要换行符。排除计算属性访问，例如 instance[something] 。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires all calls to require() to be at the top level of the module, similar to ES6 import and export statements, which also can occur only at the top level.
trans-unit.target: 此规则要求对 require() 的所有调用都在模块的顶层，类似于ES6 import 和 export 语句，后者也只能在顶层发生。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires all immediately-invoked function expressions to be wrapped in parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则要求所有立即调用的函数表达式都要用括号包起来。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires an empty line before return statements to increase code clarity, except when the return is alone inside a statement group (such as an if statement). In the latter case, the return statement does not need to be delineated by virtue of it being alone. Comments are ignored and do not count as empty lines.
trans-unit.target: 该规则在 return 语句之前需要一个空行以提高代码的清晰度，除非 return 仅在语句组（例如if语句）内。在后一种情况下，不必仅通过 return 语句来描述它。注释将被忽略，不算作空行。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires constructor names to begin with a capital letter. Certain built-in identifiers are exempt from this rule. These identifiers are:
trans-unit.target: 这条规则要求构造函数名称以大写字母开头。某些内置的标识符不受此规则限制。这些标识符是:

trans-unit.source: This rule requires empty lines before and/or after comments. It can be enabled separately for both block (/*) and line (//) comments. This rule does not apply to comments that appear on the same line as code and does not require empty lines at the beginning or end of a file.
trans-unit.target: 此规则要求注释之前和/或之后的空白行。可以为块（ /* ）和行（ // ）注释分别启用它。此规则不适用于与代码显示在同一行上的注释，并且不需要在文件的开头或结尾使用空行。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires function names to match the name of the variable or property to which they are assigned. The rule will ignore property assignments where the property name is a literal that is not a valid identifier in the ECMAScript version specified in your configuration (default ES5).
trans-unit.target: 这条规则要求函数名称与分配给它们的变量或属性名称相匹配。如果属性名是一个文字,而这个文字在你的配置中指定的ECMAScript版本中不是一个有效的标识符,那么这条规则将忽略属性分配(默认为ES5)。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires grouped definitions of accessor functions for the same property in object literals, class declarations and class expressions.
trans-unit.target: 该规则要求在对象字面、类声明和类表达式中对同一属性的访问函数进行分组定义。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires identifiers in assignments and function definitions to match a specified regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 此规则要求赋值和 function 定义中的标识符与指定的正则表达式匹配。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires or disallows assignment operator shorthand where possible.
trans-unit.target: 本规则要求或尽可能不允许转让操作符速记。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires or disallows blank lines between the given 2 kinds of statements. Properly blank lines help developers to understand the code.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则要求或不允许在给定的2种语句之间空行。适当的空行有助于开发人员理解代码。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires or disallows blank newlines around directive prologues. This rule does not enforce any conventions about blank newlines between the individual directives. In addition, it does not require blank newlines before directive prologues unless they are preceded by a comment. Please use the padded-blocks rule if this is a style you would like to enforce.
trans-unit.target: 该规则要求或禁止在指令序言周围使用空白换行符。此规则不强制执行有关各个指令之间的空白换行符的任何约定。此外，除非在指令序言之前加上注释，否则它不需要在指令序言之前留空换行符。如果您想强制使用这种样式，请使用填充块规则。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires or disallows global strict mode invoked by a "use strict" pragma in the global scope.
trans-unit.target: 该规则要求或禁止由全局范围内的 "use strict" 程序调用的全局严格模式。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires or disallows spaces between the function name and the opening parenthesis that calls it.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则要求或不允许在函数名和调用函数的开头括号之间留有空格。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires or disallows strict mode directives.
trans-unit.target: 该规则要求或不允许严格的模式指令。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires quotes around object literal property names.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则要求在对象文字属性名周围加引号。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires that all imports from a single module exists in a single import statement.
trans-unit.target: 此规则要求所有来自单个模块的 import 存在于单个import语句中。

trans-unit.source: This rule requires that function declarations and, optionally, variable declarations be in the root of a program or the body of a function.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则要求函数声明和变量声明必须在程序的根部或函数的主体中。

trans-unit.source: This rule restricts the use of parentheses to only where they are necessary.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则限制了括号的使用,只有在必要的情况下才能使用。

trans-unit.source: This rule restricts what can be thrown as an exception. When it was first created, it only prevented literals from being thrown (hence the name), but it has now been expanded to only allow expressions which have a possibility of being an Error object.
trans-unit.target: 该规则限制了可以作为异常抛出的内容。初次创建时，它只能防止文字被抛出（因此而得名），但现在已被扩展为仅允许可能成为 Error 对象的表达式。

trans-unit.source: This rule should not be used in ES3/5 environments.
trans-unit.target: 此规则不应在ES3/5环境中使用。

trans-unit.source: This rule should not be used in ES3/5 environments. In addition, this rule can be safely turned off if you don't want to enforce presence of description when creating Symbols.
trans-unit.target: 在ES3 / 5环境中不应使用此规则。此外，如果您不想在创建符号时强制 description 存在，则可以安全地关闭此规则。

trans-unit.source: This rule should not be used unless ES2016 is supported in your codebase.
trans-unit.target: 除非您的代码库中支持ES2016,否则不应使用此规则。

trans-unit.source: This rule should not be used unless ES2018 is supported in your codebase.
trans-unit.target: 除非您的代码库中支持ES2018,否则不应使用此规则。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes a list of objects, where the object name and property names are specified:
trans-unit.target: 该规则采用对象列表,其中指定对象名称和属性名称。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes a list of strings, where each string is a global to be restricted:
trans-unit.target: 这条规则接受一个字符串列表,其中每个字符串都是一个要限制的全局。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes a list of strings, where each string is an AST selector:
trans-unit.target: 这条规则接受一个字符串列表,其中每个字符串是一个AST选择器。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes an object argument with before and after properties, each with a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 该规则采用一个对象参数，该参数具有 before 和 after 属性，每个属性均具有布尔值。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes an optional string of "always" or "never" (when omitted, it defaults to "always"), and an optional options object with two properties considerPropertyDescriptor and includeCommonJSModuleExports.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则的“总是”或“从不”可选字符串（省略，则默认为“总是”时），和一个可选的选项具有两个属性对象 considerPropertyDescriptor 和 includeCommonJSModuleExports 。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one argument which can be a string or an object. The string settings are the same as those of the vars property (explained below).
trans-unit.target: 此规则采用一个参数，该参数可以是字符串或对象。字符串设置与 vars 属性的设置相同（如下所述）。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one argument, which can be a string or an object. The string settings are the same as those of the position property (explained below). The object option has the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 此规则采用一个参数，可以是字符串或对象。字符串设置与 position 属性的设置相同（如下所述）。对象选项具有以下属性：

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one argument. If it is "always" then blocks must always have at least one preceding space. If "never" then all blocks should never have any preceding space. If different spacing is desired for function blocks, keyword blocks and classes, an optional configuration object can be passed as the rule argument to configure the cases separately. If any value in the configuration object is "off", then neither style will be enforced for blocks of that kind.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则有一个论点。如果它是 "always" 则块必须始终至少有一个前面的空间。如果 "never" 则所有块都不应再有任何前面的空间。如果功能块，关键字块和类需要不同的间距，则可以将可选的配置对象作为规则参数传递，以分别配置大小写。如果配置对象中的任何值都为 "off" ，则不会对这种类型的块强制使用任何样式。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one argument. If it is "always" then the keywords must be followed by at least one space. If "never" then there should be no spaces following. The default is "always".
trans-unit.target: 这条规则有一个论点。如果它是 "always" 则关键字后面必须至少有一个空格。如果 "never" 则后面不应有空格。默认值为 "always" 。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one argument. If it is "always", which is the default option, all named functions and anonymous functions must have space before function parentheses. If "never" then all named functions and anonymous functions must not have space before function parentheses. If you want different spacing for named and anonymous functions you can pass a configuration object as the rule argument to configure those separately (e. g. {"anonymous": "always", "named": "never"}).
trans-unit.target: 这条规则有一个论点。如果它是 "always" （默认选项），则所有命名函数和匿名函数必须在函数括号前有空格。如果为 "never" 则所有命名函数和匿名函数在函数括号前都不能有空格。如果要给命名函数和匿名函数使用不同的间距，则可以将配置对象作为规则参数传递，以分别配置它们（例如 {"anonymous": "always", "named": "never"} ）。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one argument: "always" or "never". If "always" then the keywords must be preceded by at least one space. If "never" then no spaces will be allowed before the keywords else, while (do...while), finally and catch. The default value is "always".
trans-unit.target: 该规则采用一个参数： "always" 或 "never" 。如果 "always" 则关键字必须至少带有一个空格。如果为 "never" 则关键字 else ， while （do ... while）， finally 和 catch 之前不允许有空格。默认值为 "always" 。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one option, an object, with a boolean property "props", and arrays "ignorePropertyModificationsFor" and "ignorePropertyModificationsForRegex". "props" is false by default. If "props" is set to true, this rule warns against the modification of parameter properties unless they're included in "ignorePropertyModificationsFor" or "ignorePropertyModificationsForRegex", which is an empty array by default.
trans-unit.target: 该规则采用一个选项，即一个对象，该对象具有布尔属性 "props" 以及数组 "ignorePropertyModificationsFor" 和 "ignorePropertyModificationsForRegex" 。默认情况下， "props" 为 false 。如果将 "props" 设置为 true ，则此规则将警告您不要修改参数属性，除非它们包含在 "ignorePropertyModificationsFor" 或 "ignorePropertyModificationsForRegex" ，默认情况下为空数组。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one option, an object, with properties "builtinGlobals", "hoist" and "allow".
trans-unit.target: 该规则采用一个选项，即对象，其属性为 "builtinGlobals" ， "hoist" 和 "allow" 。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one option.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则采取一种方案。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one option: a string with the value of "never" or "always". The default value is "never".
trans-unit.target: 此规则采用一个选项：值为 "never" 或 "always" 的字符串。默认值为 "never" 。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one optional argument, an object with a boolean property "builtinGlobals". It defaults to true. If set to true, this rule also checks redeclaration of built-in globals, such as Object, Array, Number...
trans-unit.target: 该规则采用一个可选参数，即具有布尔属性 "builtinGlobals" 的对象。默认为 true 。如果设置为 true ，则此规则还将检查内置全局变量的重新声明，例如 Object ， Array ， Number ...

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one optional argument, an object with a single key, includeExports which is a boolean. It defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 该规则采用一个可选参数，即具有单个键的对象， includeExports 是 boolean 。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes one optional object argument:
trans-unit.target: 这条规则需要一个可选的对象参数。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes two arguments. If the first is "always" then the // must be followed by at least once whitespace. If "never" then there should be no whitespace following. The default is "always".
trans-unit.target: 该规则有两个参数。如果第一个是 "always" 则必须 // 至少跟一个空格。如果 "never" 则后面不应有空格。默认值为 "always" 。

trans-unit.source: This rule takes two sets of configuration objects. The first object parameter determines what types of destructuring the rule applies to.
trans-unit.target: 该规则需要两组配置对象。第一个对象参数决定该规则适用于什么类型的拆解。

trans-unit.source: This rule warns async functions which have no await expression.
trans-unit.target: 该规则警告没有 await 表达式的异步函数。

trans-unit.source: This rule warns if setters are defined without getters. Using an option getWithoutSet, it will warn if you have a getter without a setter also.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有使用getter定义setter时，此规则将发出警告。使用选项 getWithoutSet ，如果您同时具有不带setter的getter，它将发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule warns the assignments, increments, and decrements of imported bindings.
trans-unit.target: 该规则对导入绑定的赋值、增量和减量进行警告。

trans-unit.source: This rule was deprecated in ESLint v5.10.0.
trans-unit.target: ESLint v5.10.0 中不推荐使用此规则。

trans-unit.source: This rule was deprecated in ESLint v3.3.0 and replaced by the func-call-spacing rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则在ESLint v3.3.0 中已弃用，并由func-call-spacing规则代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule was deprecated in ESLint v3.3.0 and replaced by the no-global-assign rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则在ESLint v3.3.0 中已弃用，并由no-global-assign规则代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule was deprecated in ESLint v3.3.0 and replaced by the no-unsafe-negation rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则在ESLint v3.3.0 中已弃用，并由no-unsafe-negation规则代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule was deprecated in ESLint v3.9.0 and will not be replaced. The original intent of this rule now seems misguided as we have come to understand that Reflect methods are not actually intended to replace the Object counterparts the rule suggests, but rather exist as low-level primitives to be used with proxies in order to replicate the default behavior of various previously existing functionality.
trans-unit.target: 此规则在ESLint v3.9.0 中已弃用，不会被替换。现在，该规则的初衷似乎被误导了，因为我们已经了解到， Reflect 方法实际上并不是要替换该规则建议的 Object 对应对象，而是作为低级原语存在，以与代理一起使用以复制默认值。各种现有功能的行为。

trans-unit.source: This rule was deprecated in ESLint v4.0.0 and replaced by the padding-line-between-statements rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则在ESLint v4.0.0 中已弃用，并由padding-line-between-statements规则代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule was deprecated in ESLint v5.1.0.
trans-unit.target: ESLint v5.1.0 中不推荐使用此规则。

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v0.10.0 and replaced by the space-unary-ops rule.
trans-unit.target: 该规则已在ESLint v0.10.0 中删除，并由space-unary-ops规则代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v1.0 and replaced by the comma-dangle rule.
trans-unit.target: 该规则已在ESLint v1.0 中删除，并由逗号分隔规则代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v1.0 and replaced by the generator-star-spacing rule.
trans-unit.target: 该规则已在ESLint v1.0 中删除，并由generator-star-spacing规则代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v1.0 and replaced by the no-empty-character-class rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则在ESLint v1.0中已删除，并由no-empty-character-class规则代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v1.0 and replaced by the no-extra-parens rule. The "functions" option in the new rule is equivalent to the removed rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则已在ESLint v1.0 中删除，并由无额外限制的规则代替。新规则中的 "functions" 选项等效于已删除的规则。

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v1.0 and replaced by the object-curly-spacing and array-bracket-spacing rules.
trans-unit.target: 此规则已在ESLint v1.0 中删除，并由object-curly-spacing和array-bracket-spacing规则代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v1.0 and replaced by the quote-props rule.
trans-unit.target: 该规则已在ESLint v1.0 中删除，并由quote-props规则代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v1.0 and replaced by the semi-spacing rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则已在ESLint v1.0 中删除，并由半间距规则代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v1.0 and replaced by the space-before-function-paren rule.
trans-unit.target: 在此规则删除在ESLint v1.0和更换由空间前方的功能括号规则。

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v1.0 and replaced by the space-before-function-paren rule. The name of the rule changed from "parentheses" to "paren" for consistency with the names of other rules.
trans-unit.target: 在此规则删除在ESLint v1.0和更换由空间前方的功能括号规则。规则的名称从“括号”更改为“原谅”，以与其他规则的名称保持一致。

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v1.0 and replaced by the spaced-comment rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则已在ESLint v1.0 中删除，并由空格注释规则代替。

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v1.0 and replaced by the strict rule. The "global" option in the new rule is most similar to the removed rule.

trans-unit.source: This rule was removed in ESLint v1.0 and replaced by the strict rule. The "global" or "function" options in the new rule are similar to the removed rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则已在ESLint v1.0 中删除，并由严格规则代替。新规则中的 "global" 或 "function" 选项类似于已删除的规则。

trans-unit.source: This rule will enforce consistency of spacing after the start of a comment // or /*. It also provides several exceptions for various documentation styles.

trans-unit.source: This rule will enforce consistency of spacing after the start of a line comment //.

trans-unit.source: This rule will enforce consistency of spacing before blocks. It is only applied on blocks that don’t begin on a new line.
trans-unit.target: 该规则将强制在块之前保持间距的一致性。它仅适用于不以新行开头的块。

trans-unit.source: This rule will enforce consistency of spacing before the keywords if, else, for, while, do, switch, throw, try, catch, finally, with, break, continue, return, function, yield, class and variable declarations (let, const, var) and label statements.
trans-unit.target: 此规则将强制关键字前间距的一致性 if ， else ， for ， while ， do ， switch ， throw ， try ， catch ， finally ， with ， break ， continue ， return ， function ， yield ， class 和变量声明（ let ， const ， var ）和label语句。

trans-unit.source: This rule will enforce consistent spacing directly inside of parentheses, by disallowing or requiring one or more spaces to the right of ( and to the left of ).
trans-unit.target: 通过禁止或要求在 ( 或 ) 左侧的一个或多个空格，此规则将直接在括号内强制使用一致的间距。

trans-unit.source: To make the upgrade process easier, we've introduced the indent-legacy rule as a snapshot of the indent rule from 3.x. If you run into issues from the indent rule when you upgrade, you should be able to use the indent-legacy rule to replicate the 3.x behavior. However, the indent-legacy rule is deprecated and will not receive bugfixes or improvements in the future, so you should eventually switch back to the indent rule.
trans-unit.target: 为了简化升级过程，我们引入了 indent-legacy 规则作为3.x版 indent 规则的快照。如果您在升级时遇到 indent 规则的问题，则应该能够使用 indent-legacy 规则来复制3.x行为。但是， indent-legacy 规则已被弃用，将来也不会收到错误修正或改进，因此您最终应切换 indent 规则。

trans-unit.source: To prevent calling the callback multiple times it is important to return anytime the callback is triggered outside of the main function body. Neglecting this technique often leads to issues where you do something more than once. For example, in the case of an HTTP request, you may try to send HTTP headers more than once leading Node.js to throw a Can't render headers after they are sent to the client. error.
trans-unit.target: 为了防止多次调用该回调，重要的是在该回调在主体函数体之外被触发时随时 return 。忽略此技术通常会导致您执行不止一次的问题。例如，在一个HTTP请求的情况下，你可能会试图发送的HTTP头不止一次领先的Node.js来 throw 一 Can't render headers after they are sent to the client. 错误。

trans-unit.source: Trailing commas in object literals are valid according to the ECMAScript 5 (and ECMAScript 3!) spec, however IE8 (when not in IE8 document mode) and below will throw an error when it encounters trailing commas in JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 根据ECMAScript 5(和ECMAScript 3!)的规范,对象字面中的尾部逗号是有效的,但是IE8(当不在IE8文档模式下时)及以下版本在遇到JavaScript中的尾部逗号时会抛出一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Trailing commas in object literals are valid according to the ECMAScript 5 (and ECMAScript 3!) spec. However, IE8 (when not in IE8 document mode) and below will throw an error when it encounters trailing commas in JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 根据ECMAScript 5(和ECMAScript 3!)的规范,对象文字中的尾部逗号是有效的。然而,IE8(当不在IE8文档模式下时)及以下版本在遇到JavaScript中的尾部逗号时,会抛出一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Trailing commas simplify adding and removing items to objects and arrays, since only the lines you are modifying must be touched. Another argument in favor of trailing commas is that it improves the clarity of diffs when an item is added or removed from an object or array:
trans-unit.target: 后面的逗号简化了在对象和数组中添加和删除项目的过程,因为只有你要修改的行才必须被触及。另一个支持尾部逗号的论点是,当从对象或数组中添加或删除一个项目时,它可以提高差异的清晰度。

trans-unit.source: Trailing newlines in non-empty files are a common UNIX idiom. Benefits of trailing newlines include the ability to concatenate or append to files as well as output files to the terminal without interfering with shell prompts.
trans-unit.target: 在非空文件中使用尾部的换行符是一种常见的UNIX习惯。尾部换行的好处包括能够连接或追加文件,以及在不干扰shell提示的情况下向终端输出文件。

trans-unit.source: Two identical test conditions in the same chain are almost always a mistake in the code. Unless there are side effects in the expressions, a duplicate will evaluate to the same true or false value as the identical expression earlier in the chain, meaning that its branch can never execute.
trans-unit.target: 同一链中的两个相同的测试条件几乎总是代码中的错误。除非表达式中有副作用，否则重复项的计算结果与链中早先相同表达式的 true 或 false 值相同，这意味着其分支永远无法执行。

trans-unit.source: Unicode includes the characters which are made with multiple code points. RegExp character class syntax (/[abc]/) cannot handle characters which are made by multiple code points as a character; those characters will be dissolved to each code point. For example, ❇️ is made by ❇ (U+2747) and VARIATION SELECTOR-16 (U+FE0F). If this character is in RegExp character class, it will match to either ❇ (U+2747) or VARIATION SELECTOR-16 (U+FE0F) rather than ❇️.
trans-unit.target: Unicode包含由多个代码点组成的字符。 RegExp字符类语法（ /[abc]/ ）无法处理由多个代码点组成的字符。这些字符将被分解到每个代码点。例如， ❇️ 由 ❇ （ U+2747 ）和VARIATION SELECTOR-16（ U+FE0F ）组成。如果此字符属于RegExp字符类，它将与 ❇ （ U+2747 ）或VARIATION SELECTOR-16（ U+FE0F ）而不是 ❇️ 匹配。

trans-unit.source: Variable names should be formatted in camel case with the first letter being lowercase and the first letter of each subsequent word being uppercase. The first word of a variable name should be a noun (not a verb) to avoid confusion with functions. Do not use underscore for variable names.

trans-unit.source: Variables can be declared at any point in JavaScript code using var, let, or const. There are many styles and preferences related to the declaration of variables, and one of those is deciding on how many variable declarations should be allowed in a single function.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 var ， let 或 const 在JavaScript代码的任何位置声明变量。有许多与变量声明相关的样式和首选项，其中之一是确定单个函数中应允许多少个变量声明。

trans-unit.source: Variables in a loop condition often are modified in the loop. If not, it's possibly a mistake.
trans-unit.target: 循环条件中的变量往往在循环中被修改。如果没有,可能是个错误。

trans-unit.source: Variables must be initialized at declaration (default)
trans-unit.target: 变量必须在声明时初始化(默认)

trans-unit.source: Variables must not be initialized at declaration
trans-unit.target: 变量不得在声明时初始化

trans-unit.source: Variables must not be initialized at declaration, except in for loops, where it is allowed
trans-unit.target: 变量不能在声明时初始化,除非在for循环中允许初始化。

trans-unit.source: Variables should not be declared in the initialization section of a for statement.
trans-unit.target: 变量不应在 for 语句的初始化部分中声明。

trans-unit.source: Variables that act as constants (values that won't be changed) should be formatted using all uppercase letters with words separated by a single underscore.
trans-unit.target: 作为常量的变量(不会被改变的值)应该使用所有大写字母和单词的格式,用一个下划线分隔。

trans-unit.source: Variables that are declared and not used anywhere in the code are most likely an error due to incomplete refactoring. Such variables take up space in the code and can lead to confusion by readers.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中声明了变量却没有在任何地方使用的变量,很可能是由于重构不完全而导致的错误。这样的变量占用了代码的空间,会导致读者的混淆。

trans-unit.source: Variables that should be undefined are simply left uninitialized. (All uninitialized variables automatically get the value of undefined in JavaScript.)
trans-unit.target: 应该将 undefined 变量保留为未初始化。（所有未初始化的变量会自动获取JavaScript 中 undefined 的值。）

trans-unit.source: Various whitespace characters can be inputted by programmers by mistake for example from copying or keyboard shortcuts. Pressing Alt + Space on macOS adds in a non breaking space character for example.
trans-unit.target: 各种空白字符可能被程序员误输入,例如从复制或键盘快捷键。例如,在macOS上按Alt+Space键可以添加一个不间断的空格字符。

trans-unit.source: Version control systems sometimes have special behavior for linebreaks. To make it easy for developers to contribute to your codebase from different platforms, you may want to configure your VCS to handle linebreaks appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 版本控制系统有时对行中断有特殊的行为。为了使开发人员能够轻松地从不同的平台向您的代码库做出贡献,您可能需要配置您的VCS来适当地处理行中断。

trans-unit.source: Very long lines of code in any language can be difficult to read. In order to aid in readability and maintainability many coders have developed a convention to limit lines of code to X number of characters (traditionally 80 characters).
trans-unit.target: 在任何语言中,非常长的代码行都是难以阅读的。为了帮助提高可读性和可维护性,许多编码人员制定了一个惯例,将代码行限制在X个字符(传统上是80个字符)以内。

trans-unit.source: Very short identifier names like e, x, _t or very long ones like hashGeneratorResultOutputContainerObject can make code harder to read and potentially less maintainable. To prevent this, one may enforce a minimum and/or maximum identifier length.
trans-unit.target: 很短的标识符名称（例如 e ， x ， _t )或很长的标识符名称（例如 hashGeneratorResultOutputContainerObject )会使代码难以阅读，并且可能难以维护。为了防止这种情况，可以强制执行最小和/或最大标识符长度。

trans-unit.source: We found some bugs in our scope analysis that needed to be addressed. Specifically, we were not properly accounting for global variables in all the ways they are defined.
trans-unit.target: 我们在范围分析中发现了一些需要解决的错误。具体来说,我们并没有以定义全局变量的所有方式对其进行适当的计算。

trans-unit.source: We get a lot of proposals for new rules in ESLint. This section explains how we determine which rules are accepted and what information you should provide to help us evaluate your proposal.
trans-unit.target: 在ESLint中,我们收到了很多关于新规则的建议,本节将解释我们如何确定哪些规则被接受,以及您应该提供哪些信息帮助我们评估您的建议。本节解释了我们如何确定哪些规则被接受,以及您应该提供哪些信息来帮助我们评估您的建议。

trans-unit.source: We hope that by following these guidelines we will be able to continue improving and working to make ESLint the best tool it can be while causing as little disruption to our users as possible during the process.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望通过遵循这些准则,我们能够继续改进和努力使ESLint成为最好的工具,同时在这个过程中尽可能减少对用户的干扰。

trans-unit.source: We may ask you to make changes, rebase, or squash your commits.
trans-unit.target: 我们可能会要求你对你的提交进行修改、重写或压制。

trans-unit.source: We need all of this information in order to determine whether or not the rule is a good core rule candidate.

trans-unit.source: When enforceForClassMembers is set to true, the rule will also disallow unnecessary computed keys inside of class methods, getters and setters.
trans-unit.target: 当 enforceForClassMembers 设置为 true 时，该规则还将禁止在类方法，getter和setter中使用不必要的计算键。

trans-unit.source: When enforceForClassMembers is set to true, the rule will also disallow/enforce spaces inside of computed keys of class methods, getters and setters.
trans-unit.target: 当 enforceForClassMembers 设置为 true 时，该规则还将禁止/强制在类方法，获取器和设置器的计算键内添加空格。

trans-unit.target: 当 enforceForClassMembers 设置为 true 时：

trans-unit.source: When true the rule ignores the case-sensitivity of the imports local name.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ,则规则将忽略导入本地名称的区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: When ESLint is run, it looks in the current working directory to find an .eslintignore file before determining which files to lint. If this file is found, then those preferences are applied when traversing directories. Only one .eslintignore file can be used at a time, so .eslintignore files other than the one in the current working directory will not be used.
trans-unit.target: 当运行ESLint时，它将在确定工作文件之前先在当前工作目录中查找 .eslintignore 文件。如果找到此文件，则遍历目录时将应用这些首选项。一次只能使用一个 .eslintignore 文件，因此将不使用当前工作目录中的 .eslintignore 文件。

trans-unit.source: When ESLint v5 encounters a plugin name in a config starting with @, the plugin will be resolved as a scoped npm package. For example, if a config contains "plugins": ["@foo"], ESLint v5 will attempt to load a package called @foo/eslint-plugin. (On the other hand, ESLint v4 would attempt to load a package called eslint-plugin-@foo.) This is a breaking change because users might have been relying on ESLint finding a package at node_modules/eslint-plugin-@foo. However, we think it is unlikely that many users were relying on this behavior, because packages published to npm cannot contain an @ character in the middle.
trans-unit.target: 当ESLint v5在以 @ 开头的配置中遇到插件名称时，该插件将被解析为作用域npm软件包。例如，如果配置包含 "plugins": ["@foo"] ，则ESLint v5将尝试加载名为 @foo/eslint-plugin 的软件包。 （另一方面，ESLint v4将尝试加载名为 eslint-plugin-@foo 的软件包。）这是一个重大更改，因为用户可能一直依赖ESLint在 node_modules/eslint-plugin-@foo 处找到软件包。但是，我们认为许多用户不太可能依赖此行为，因为发布到npm的软件包中间不能包含 @ 字符。

trans-unit.source: When Not To Use It
trans-unit.target: 何时不使用它

trans-unit.source: When Object.assign is called using an object literal as the first argument, this rule requires using the object spread syntax instead. This rule also warns on cases where an Object.assign call is made using a single argument that is an object literal, in this case, the Object.assign call is not needed.
trans-unit.target: 当使用对象文字作为第一个参数调用Object.assign时，此规则要求使用对象传播语法。这条规则也警告在哪里的情况下 Object.assign 呼叫使用一个参数是一个对象文本，在这种情况下，做出 Object.assign 不需要调用。

trans-unit.source: When a directive occurs at the beginning of a function body, strict mode applies only to that function, including all contained functions:
trans-unit.target: 当一个指令出现在函数体的开头时,严格模式只适用于该函数,包括所有包含的函数。

trans-unit.source: When a directive occurs in global scope, strict mode applies to the entire script:
trans-unit.target: 当一个指令发生在全局范围内时,严格模式适用于整个脚本。

trans-unit.source: When a project may use non-strict-mode code side by side with strict-mode code and the files are not concatenated, the decision to use global strict mode can be made on an individual basis, rendering this rule unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: 当一个项目可能同时使用非严格模式的代码和严格模式的代码,且文件不连贯时,可以根据具体情况决定是否使用全局严格模式,从而使这一规则成为不必要。

trans-unit.source: When a regular expression is known in advance, it is considered a best practice to avoid the string literal notation on top of the regular expression notation, and use regular expression literals instead of the constructor function.
trans-unit.target: 当事先知道正则表达式时,认为最好的做法是避免在正则表达式符号之上使用字符串文字符号,而用正则表达式文字代替构造函数。

trans-unit.source: When a regular expression is used in certain situations, it can end up looking like a division operator. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当正则表达式在某些情况下使用时,它可能最终看起来像一个除法运算符。比如说:

trans-unit.source: When a statement is too long to fit on a single line, line breaks are generally inserted next to the operators separating expressions. The first style coming to mind would be to place the operator at the end of the line, following the English punctuation rules.
trans-unit.target: 当一个语句太长,无法在一行中找到合适的位置时,一般会在分隔表达式的运算符旁边插入换行符。我想到的第一种方式是按照英语标点符号规则,将操作符放在行尾。

trans-unit.source: When a value for generators is not provided the behavior for generator functions falls back to the base option.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 generators 的值，则生成器功能的行为将退回到基本选项。

trans-unit.source: When an object is created with the new operator, __proto__ is set to the original "prototype" property of the object's constructor function. Object.getPrototypeOf is the preferred method of getting the object's prototype. To change an object's prototype, use Object.setPrototypeOf.
trans-unit.target: 使用 new 运算符创建对象时， __proto__ 设置为对象的构造函数的原始“ prototype”属性。 Object.getPrototypeOf 是获取对象原型的首选方法。要更改对象的原型，请使用 Object.setPrototypeOf 。

trans-unit.source: When an object literal is passed to a function, the opening brace should be on the same line as if the value is a variable. All other formatting rules from above still apply.
trans-unit.target: 当一个对象文字被传递给一个函数时,开头的括号应该和值是一个变量一样在同一行。所有其他的格式化规则仍然适用。

trans-unit.source: When assigning a value to a variable, use parentheses around a right-side expression that contains a comparison.
trans-unit.target: 当给一个变量赋值时,在包含比较的右侧表达式周围使用括号。

trans-unit.source: When calling a function, developers may insert optional whitespace between the function's name and the parentheses that invoke it. The following pairs of function calls are equivalent:
trans-unit.target: 在调用函数时,开发者可以在函数名和调用函数的括号之间插入可选的空白。以下的函数调用对等。

trans-unit.source: When comparing two selectors, the selector that contains more class selectors, attribute selectors, and pseudo-class selectors (excluding :not()) has higher specificity.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个选择器时，包含更多类选择器，属性选择器和伪类选择器（不包括 :not() ）的选择器具有更高的特异性。

trans-unit.source: When creating a config, users sometimes make typos or misunderstand how the config is supposed to be structured. Previously, ESLint did not validate the properties of a config file, so a typo in a config could be very tedious to debug. Starting in 4.0.0, ESLint will raise an error if a property in a config file is unrecognized or has the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: 在创建配置文件时,用户有时会出现错别字或误解配置文件的结构。以前,ESLint并不验证配置文件的属性,所以配置文件中的一个错别字在调试时可能会非常繁琐。从4.0.0开始,如果配置文件中的一个属性未被识别或有错误的类型,ESLint将引发一个错误。

trans-unit.source: When declaring multiple imports, a sorted list of import declarations make it easier for developers to read the code and find necessary imports later. This rule is purely a matter of style.
trans-unit.target: 在声明多个导入时,导入声明的排序列表可以使开发人员更容易阅读代码,并在以后找到必要的导入。这个规则纯粹是一个风格问题。

trans-unit.source: When declaring multiple properties, some developers prefer to sort property names alphabetically to be able to find necessary property easier at the later time. Others feel that it adds complexity and becomes burden to maintain.
trans-unit.target: 在申报多个楼盘时,有些开发商喜欢将楼盘名称按字母顺序排列,以便日后更容易找到所需楼盘。也有人觉得这样会增加复杂性,成为维护的负担。

trans-unit.source: When declaring multiple variables within the same block, some developers prefer to sort variable names alphabetically to be able to find necessary variable easier at the later time. Others feel that it adds complexity and becomes burden to maintain.
trans-unit.target: 当在同一个代码块中声明多个变量时,一些开发人员喜欢按字母顺序排列变量名,以便以后能够更容易地找到必要的变量。而另一些人则认为这增加了复杂性,成为维护的负担。

trans-unit.source: When developing in the ESLint core repository, the npm run perf command gives a high-level overview of ESLint running time with all core rules enabled.
trans-unit.target: 在ESLint核心存储库中进行开发时， npm run perf 命令可在启用所有核心规则的情况下提供ESLint运行时间的高级概述。

trans-unit.source: When developing with a lot of people all having different editors, VCS applications and operating systems it may occur that different line endings are written by either of the mentioned (might especially happen when using the windows and mac versions of SourceTree together).
trans-unit.target: 当有很多人使用不同的编辑器、VCS应用程序和操作系统进行开发时,可能会出现上述任何一个人编写的行结尾不同的情况(特别是在同时使用Windows和Mac版本的SourceTree时可能会出现这种情况)。

trans-unit.source: When formatting a function, whitespace is allowed between the function name or function keyword and the opening paren. Named functions also require a space between the function keyword and the function name, but anonymous functions require no whitespace. For example:
trans-unit.target: 格式化函数时，函数名称或 function 关键字与开头括号之间应留有空格。命名函数在 function 关键字和函数名称之间也需要一个空格，但是匿名函数不需要空格。例如：

trans-unit.source: When it comes to naming variables, style guides generally fall into one of two camps: camelcase (variableName) and underscores (variable_name). This rule focuses on using the camelcase approach. If your style guide calls for camelCasing your variable names, then this rule is for you!
trans-unit.target: 在命名变量时，样式指南通常分为以下两个阵营之一：camelcase（ variableName ）和下划线（ variable_name ）。该规则侧重于使用驼峰法。如果您的样式指南要求使用驼峰式变量名，那么此规则适合您！

trans-unit.source: When linting files, ESLint will exit with one of the following exit codes:
trans-unit.target: 当对文件进行精简时,ESLint将以下列退出代码之一退出。

trans-unit.source: When on a separate line, a single-line comment should be at the same indentation level as the code it describes and be preceded by a single line. Never use multiple single-line comments on consecutive lines, use a multi-line comment instead.
trans-unit.target: 当在单独的一行上时,单行注释应该与它所描述的代码处于同一缩进级别,并在前面加一行。切勿在连续的行上使用多个单行注释,而应使用多行注释。

trans-unit.source: When parentheses are used, there should be no whitespace immediately after the opening paren or immediately before the closing paren.
trans-unit.target: 当使用小括号时,在紧靠开头的paren之后或紧靠结尾的paren之前不应有空格。

trans-unit.source: When parsing JSX code like <a>foo</a>, the default parser will now give the foo AST node the JSXText type, rather than the Literal type. This makes the AST compliant with a recent update to the JSX spec.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当解析诸如 <a>foo</a> 类的JSX代码时，默认的解析器将为 foo AST节点提供 JSXText 类型，而不是 Literal 类型。这使AST符合JSX规范的最新更新。

trans-unit.source: When set to false this option prohibits the use of function expressions as callbacks or function arguments entirely, without exception.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 false 时,此选项无一例外地禁止将函数表达式完全用作回调或函数参数。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, which it is by default, The defaultAssignment option allows expressions of the form x ? x : expr (where x is any identifier and expr is any expression).
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 时（默认情况下为true），defaultAssignment选项允许使用 x ? x : expr 形式的表达式。x：expr（其中 x 是任何标识符，而 expr 是任何表达式）。

trans-unit.source: When the code is not in strict mode, an assignment to an undeclared variable creates a new global variable. This will happen even is the code is in a function.
trans-unit.target: 当代码不在 strict 模式下时，对未声明变量的赋值将创建一个新的全局变量。即使代码在函数中，也会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: When updating the code, it's usually better to add additional commits to your branch rather than amending the original commit, because reviewers can easily tell which changes were made in response to a particular review. When we merge pull requests, we will squash all the commits from your branch into a single commit on the master branch.
trans-unit.target: 更新代码时，通常最好将其他提交添加到分支中，而不是修改原始提交，因为审阅者可以轻松判断出响应特定审阅做出了哪些更改。合并拉取请求时，我们会将您分支中的所有提交压缩到 master 分支上的单个提交中。

trans-unit.source: When used globally, as in this example, the strict mode pragma applies to all code within a single file. This can be dangerous if you concatenate scripts together before serving them to a browser. For instance, if you have a file running in strict mode and you concatenate that file with jQuery, the strict mode now also applies to jQuery and may cause errors.

trans-unit.source: When using the parseInt() function it is common to omit the second argument, the radix, and let the function try to determine from the first argument what type of number it is. By default, parseInt() will autodetect decimal and hexadecimal (via 0x prefix). Prior to ECMAScript 5, parseInt() also autodetected octal literals, which caused problems because many developers assumed a leading 0 would be ignored.

trans-unit.source: When working with browser scripts, developers often forget that variable and function declarations at the top-level scope become global variables on the window object. As opposed to modules which have their own scope. Globals should be explicitly assigned to window or self if that is the intent. Otherwise variables intended to be local to the script should be wrapped in an IIFE.
trans-unit.target: 使用浏览器脚本时，开发人员通常会忘记顶级作用域中的变量和函数声明成为 window 对象上的全局变量。与具有自己范围的模块相反。如果这样做，则应将全局变量明确分配给 window 或 self 。否则，打算用于脚本本地的变量应包装在IIFE中。

trans-unit.source: While ESLint has some built-in formatters available to format the linting results, it's also possible to create and distribute your own custom formatters. You can include custom formatters in your project directly or create an npm package to distribute them separately.
trans-unit.target: 虽然ESLint有一些内置的格式化器可用于格式化linting结果,但也可以创建和发布您自己的自定义格式化器。你可以直接在你的项目中包含自定义格式化器,或者创建一个npm包来单独发布它们。

trans-unit.source: While ESLint is designed to be run on the command line, it's possible to use ESLint programmatically through the Node.js API. The purpose of the Node.js API is to allow plugin and tool authors to use the ESLint functionality directly, without going through the command line interface.
trans-unit.target: 虽然ESLint被设计为在命令行上运行,但也可以通过Node.js API来编程使用ESLint。Node.js API的目的是允许插件和工具作者直接使用ESLint功能,而不需要通过命令行接口。

trans-unit.source: While comments are not technically part of the AST, ESLint provides a few ways for rules to access them:

trans-unit.source: With ESLint v3.0.0, we are dropping support for Node.js versions prior to 4. Node.js 0.10 and 0.12 are in maintenance mode and Node.js 4 is the current LTS version. If you are using an older version of Node.js, we recommend upgrading to at least Node.js 4 as soon as possible. If you are unable to upgrade to Node.js 4 or higher, then we recommend continuing to use ESLint v2.x until you are ready to upgrade Node.js.
